channel.title: CVE Feed for DECE Software -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for DECE Software -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-6011|2024-08-02T08:21:17.038Z -- dece%20software -- geodi
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in DECE Software Geodi allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Geodi: before 8.0.0.27396.

item.title: CVE-2023-5921|2024-08-02T08:14:24.979Z -- dece%20software -- geodi
item.description: Improper Enforcement of Behavioral Workflow vulnerability in DECE Software Geodi allows Functionality Bypass.This issue affects Geodi: before 8.0.0.27396.
